meanings.definition: To release the cock of (a firearm).
meanings.sent1: He was uncocking the gun carefully before storing it.
meanings.sent2: The soldier uncocked his rifle after the training session.
meanings.sent3: After uncocking the toy gun, the child pretended to be a detective.
meanings.sent4: The sound of uncocking echoed through the shooting range.
meanings.sent5: Uncocking the weapon made him feel safer in the house.

meanings.sent1: She felt a sense of relief after uncocking her muscles post-workout.
meanings.sent2: Uncocking her mind, she finally found peace in meditation.
meanings.sent3: Uncocking the stress away, he decided to take a long nap.
meanings.sent4: The yoga class ended with everyone uncocking their worries into the air.
meanings.sent5: Uncocking the tension in her shoulders, she let out a contented sigh.
